resources.string:
This feature showcases how you can implement multiplatform business logic and hook it up to a native UI. In this case, this activity is implemented using XML, but the store is in the shared module. 

FlowMVI provides a way to wrap your stores in ViewModels and automatically start/stop them as needed, then inject them into your UI components. 

As needed, you can even persist the state of a store into a platform-dependent container, i.e. SavedInstanceState 
Counter : %d
